channel.title: pixel on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in pixel on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-20
item.description: The biggest announcements from Google’s Pixel 6 event (3 minute read) Google has finally revealed its Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro phones.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-11
item.description: Google Pixel 6 leak teases Magic Eraser feature, plus five years of Android security updates (2 minute read) Leaks from a marketing website seem to confirm that the Pixel 6 will have a new Magic Eraser feature and get five years of Android security updates.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-03
item.description: Google Tensor debuts on the new Pixel 6 this fall (3 minute read) Tensor is Google’s first custom-built System on a Chip specifically for Pixel phones.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-01
item.description: Google announces the Pixel 5 for $699 (3 minute read) The Google Pixel 5 will be available in eight countries on October 15th, then in the US on October 29th for $699.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-07
item.description: Trump signs orders banning US business with TikTok owner ByteDance and Tencent’s WeChat (4 minute read) President Donald Trump has signed an executive order banning transactions with ByteDance and WeChat.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-04
item.description: Google announces Pixel 5, Pixel 4A 5G, and Pixel 4A all at once (7 minute read) Google has announced the Pixel 4A, Pixel 5, and the Pixel 4A 5G.
